Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
The Jing Shengya Education System, an autonomous brand under Sichuan Jiafa Jing Shengya Education Technology Co., Ltd., a subsidiary of Jiafa Education, focuses on the research and development of big data platforms for college preference selection following the College Entrance Examination (CEE), career planning platform development, consulting services for career planning and college preference selection, training for consultants specializing in career planning and college preference selection, as well as winter and summer camp training programs for career planning. It provides online services for CEE college preference selection, subject choice guidance for new CEE reforms, career planning, comprehensive quality evaluation, and admission planning services such as the Strong Foundation Plan to over 9 million college entrance examinees each year.

Since 2016, Jing Shengya has cumulatively served more than 3 million examinees across the country, becoming an influential platform within the industry for career planning and college preference selection. After years of research and accumulation, Jing Shengya now covers 29 provinces and has nearly ten million registered users.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Africa, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent), Antarctica
